titles.title: To provide that Federal funds may not be used for National Heritage Areas and similar areas, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary: 12/16/2011--Introduced. Prohibits the use of federal funding for specified National Heritage Areas, Corridors, and Partnerships and similar areas.
